titles.title: Praise Him, All Ye Little Children

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Praise Him, praise Him, all ye little children, God is love, God is love; Praise Him, praise Him, all ye little children, God is love, God is love.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Love Him, love Him, all ye little children, God is love, God is love; Love Him, love Him, all ye little children, God is love, God is love.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Thank Him, thank Him, all ye little children, God is love, God is love; Thank Him, thank Him, all ye little children, God is love, God is love.
